includedAssets.title: Green Arrow
includedAssets.synopsis: As season four of the superhero drama begins, Oliver and Felicity's getaway is cut short when evil villain Damien Darhk threatens the city.

includedAssets.title: Season 4
includedAssets.synopsis: As Oliver attempts to build a new life away from Starling City, a threat emerges that will change the Arrow team forever. Fourth season of the smash-hit DC Comics adaptation with Stephen Amell as the sharp-shooter.

includedIn.title: Arrow
includedIn.synopsis: After five years stranded on a desert island, billionaire playboy Oliver Queen returns to Starling City to battle evil as a hooded vigilante armed with a bow and arrow.
